title: Veteran Photographer Gunasiri Silva passes away
content: Onlanka News – By Janaka Alahapperuma (Pix by: Chandana Perera) Veteran photographer Mr. Gunasiri Silva whose photographs turned up in news papers, magazines and even national media outlets for many decades has passed away in the early hours on Monday 07 March after a brief illness at the age of 76. Mr. Gunasiri Silva began…
